name: modulo1
description: **Edit a file, create a new file, and clone from Bitbucket in under 2 minutes**

scripts.usemin: usemin index.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/index.html && usemin about.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/about.html && usemin contacto.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/contacto.html && usemin entornos.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/entornos.html && usemin ter_con.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/ter_con.html
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run scss && npm run imagemin && npm run usemin

author: Juan Camilo Mamian Ruiz
